mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img, reg_date, edit_date) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{username}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{profile_img}, #{reg_date}, #{edit_date});
mapper.select: SELECT member_no, userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img, reg_date, edit_date FROM members ORDER BY member_no DESC
SELECT userid, username, birthday, email, reg_date, edit_date, profile_img, profile_thumb FROM members WHERE member_no=#{member_no};
mapper.update:
UPDATE members SET
birthday = #{birthday},
email = #{email},
profile_img = #{profile_img},
profile_thumb = #{profile_thumb},
edit_date = #{edit_date} WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
